document.full_text: the top u.s. nuclear regulator on wednesday approved the launch of a safety review of u.s. nuclear reactors in response to the ongoing crisis at japan's fukushima plant.
document.title: u.s. nuclear agency plans safety review of reactors
lines_and_colors: the top u.s. nuclear regulator on wednesday approved the launch of a safety review of u.s. nuclear reactors in response to the ongoing crisis at japan's fukushima plant.
